titleStmt.title: A True and impartial narrative of the eminent hand of God that befell a Quaker and his family at the town of Panton in Lincolnshire, who affirmed he was commanded of God to pronounce Mr. Ralph James preacher of the Gospel a leper ...

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
